name: REAKTOR
description:
Move along a circle to face the REAKTOR.

Controls:

Left / Right - Move along the circle.

Space - Shoot forward.

Space + Down - Shoot backward.

Escape - Quit the game / Exit a submenu / Restart the game

Bonus:

Left Control - Time slow (doesn't affect the timer)

Left Shift - Time acceleration (doesn't affect the timer)

High Scores:

Less points = better score.

Your final score is your total time spent facing the REAKTOR (in milliseconds) divided by the amount of health you got at the end.

Day 4 / 24:

This game was made in one day for the advent jam:  https://itch.io/jam/jam-de-lavent
